Heidi Montag Clarifies the ''Misconception'' About Her and Lauren Conrad, 10 Years Later: ''I Was Nothing but a Great Friend to Her''

Heidi Montag Clarifies the ''Misconception'' About Her and Lauren Conrad, 10 Years Later: ''I Was Nothing but a Great Friend to Her'' Heidi Montag wants to clear her name in the whole Lauren Conrad feud...10 years after the demise of their friendship.
